root: ^Welcome adventures, thank you for answering my call to action.
^My son, the Prince, has fallen into a well.

c-0: ^My dear son is in his 9th life, and we are worried for his wellbeing.
^Please adventurers, I beckon you to save him.
g-0: ^Please follow the path to the right.
^There you will find the well in which he fell.
